protocol.name: P-GSE41544-1
protocol.text: ID_REF =  VALUE = MAS5.0 signal intensity Detection =  Detection p-value =

protocol.name: P-GSE41544-2
protocol.text: plant were grown on MS medium under 16 h light/ 8 h dark cycle at 22°C

protocol.name: P-GSE41544-3
protocol.text: RNeasy plant mini kit (Qiagen), according to manufacturer protocol

protocol.name: P-GSE41544-4
protocol.text: Biotinylated cDNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 300 ng total RNA (GeneChip® 3’ IVT Express Kit User Manual P/N 702646 Rev. 1, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE41544-5
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, fragmented cDNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on Affymetrix GeneChip® Chicken Genome Array. The GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.

protocol.name: P-GSE41544-6
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G

protocol.name: P-GSE41544-7
protocol.text: The Microarray Suite version 5.0 (MAS 5.0) algorithm implemented in Affymetrix Expression Console software (version1.1) was used to normalize the raw data. To reduce noise for the significance analysis, probe sets that were called Present by the MAS5 detection call in 100% of the samples were selected. Highly expressed genes that showed over 2-fold difference between the signal values of control and test samples were selected for further study.
